name: Color On Cipher
description:
Can you crack the secret color code? ColorCipher is the remake of the board game MasterMind. This version has been redesigned for play on the iPhone, featuring a brand new interface, saved games, and advanced statistics.

If you have never played before, don't worry! ColorCipher comes with detailed instructions and examples to get you started quickly.

你能破解神秘颜色代码？ ColorCipher是标记的棋盘游戏。这个版本经过重新设计，在iPhone上玩，设有一个全新的界面，保存的游戏，和先进的统计信息。

如果你从来没有玩过之前，不用担心！ ColorCipher配有详细的说明和示例，能让你迅速上手。
